function-content.1: It is a clipboard extension application that supports multiple formats such as plain text and images.
function-content.2: You can freely call up the menu with the shortcut key, and you can refer to the clipboard history at any time.
function-content.3: Also, by registering a fixed phrase as a snippet, you can paste the fixed phrase at any time.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.help: Clipy is open source. If you have any bugs, bugs, requests, etc,
opensource.waiting: We are waiting for you! Japanese is fine too!

thanks.title: Special thanks
thanks.clipmenu: Clipmenu Is released as open source
thanks.naotaka: Thank you. Without this code, it wouldn't have been possible to publish it in the form of a remake.
thanks.context: The current functions have been covered, but we will aim to further improve the functions by adding unique functions. I'm really thankful to you.
